title: Package "Salut !"
subTitle: Free 30-minute trial
description: Short and sweet - book a free 30-minute trial and show your child that learning French can be fun (despite what they may think now!)

title: Package "Ça va !"
subTitle: Pay as you go
description: Your child's schedule is already busy and you want to give them some flexibility? Choose the "pay as you go" option to book classes that fit your child's learning needs, week in, week out.

title: Package "Bien sûr !"
subTitle: Monthly subscription
description: Already living with a Tintin fanatic who wants to re-read all the comics in French asap? Opt for the monthly subscription and let them immerse in the French world in 8 hourly classes.
